scripts.postdev:mp-weixin: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = path.resolve(__dirname, 'game.json'); const destDir = path.resolve(__dirname, 'unpackage/dist/dev/mp-weixin'); const dest = path.resolve(destDir, 'game.json'); if (fs.existsSync(src)) { if (!fs.existsSync(destDir)) { fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); } fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('✅ game.json 已自动复制到构建输出目录:', dest); } else { console.warn('⚠️ 未找到 game.json 文件，请确认它存在于项目根目录'); }"
